name: The Cocktail
description:
The Cocktail faces challenges with honesty: from the user's point of view, technological edge and business orientation. We lead end to end transformation stories with specialists focused on what is most relevant: making things happen. Their analysis of the relationship between brands and people affects their point of view, and they adapt it to the market's realities.
Their professional team covers the whole spectrum of disciplines for online presence and business development: usability, information architecture, design, SEO, web metrics, back and front programming, marketing and research.
